channel.title: Bring over the music board from mitb or create a new one
channel.description:
Since in the music award thread there was interest in creating a music board I thought I'd post a new topic since the idea was likely to be lost in that thread.
There aren't many but music related threads always thrive. People are very vocal about their music tastes. I guarantee activity in the section! It works on every forum.
Either move it from mitb or create a new one. Put it in General Interests & Hobbies

item.title: Bring over the music board from mitb or create a new one
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,636724.0.html

I don’t really want to bring anymore boards over either (re: music board).

Read full topic

item.title: Bring over the music board from mitb or create a new one
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

There’s next to no decent RSPS or programming threads here anyway, so what’s the point of keeping MoparScape.org about those things. I support merging them before they both die.

Read full topic

item.source: Bring over the music board from mitb or create a new one

item.title: Bring over the music board from mitb or create a new one
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

It extends to more than just a music section for me though, as I believe moparscape stands as it’s own forum now, and moparisthebest is no longer an option for general discussion. Having the forum-linked accounts/db is practically useless now too. So it just makes sense to me that moparscape could use all the boards people would use. Music would only receive light activity, but it’s an easy one and always works.

There has to be a way to keep the rsps and programming focus and still have the boards you see at most other forums (of any kind). There is always a better way to restructure the boards also, I just cant give the advice.

moparisthebest was supposed to be a rs cheating forum like kaitnieks (edit: and of course originally for moparscape too although no one knew it would grow the way it did). All the interest was lost and very few people were doing it there. So it ride out it’s days as a general purpose forum. Other rs cheating forums opened that were better options for the average cheater. I doubt moparisthebest is too attached to kaitnieks anymore, but who knows what his plans are for preserving the forums. But thankfully for moparscape, people ARE using private servers, and it still seems like a lot more than the # of cheaters of my time.

Read full topic
item.source: Bring over the music board from mitb or create a new one

item.title: Bring over the music board from mitb or create a new one
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

The forum is running smoothly without it so I don’t see a point for it. Though, even with my love for music I really don’t care either way. But I do want to stress the fact and it has been said before that the main focus of the forum is probably programming if not rsps so why derail something that moparisthebest has been trying to develop for years now even though it is dying. Moparisthebest loved kaitnetiks or however you spell it and I’m sure he would probably be against this because it drives his train right off the rails and then destroys the mindset of this forum ever being somewhat similar to kaitnetiks. Which is something he has been doing for such a long long time. But even so, I could go either way.

Read full topic
item.source: Bring over the music board from mitb or create a new one

item.title: Bring over the music board from mitb or create a new one
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

I would really want this. Could showcase some beats on my practice pad.

You can showcase them anyways, I just thought the section would help create more discussion around the forums.

I suppose the reviews and multimedia section does the trick though.

Read full topic

item.title: Bring over the music board from mitb or create a new one
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Brolapse, post:24, topic:530453”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=649213.msg4363808#msg4363808 date=1379259774]
From IRC:

%bnl | why not just move every single board over to moparscape from moparisthebest and close down moparisthebest forums
%bnl | then rename moparscape to moparisthebest
%bnl | ???
[/quote]
I have created a visual representation of what I believe this would look like:
http://i.imgur.com/YYsMDJx.jpg NSFW

p.s. I support this idea[/quote]
Your support is appreciated.

Arcik:

Why don’t you just merge mscp and mitb now if you’re slowly going to move everything across anyway? It’s bound to happen. (mitb sounds better :|)

Because the plan of moving every single board over to moparscape from moparisthebest and then closing down moparisthebest forums and finally renaming moparscape to moparisthebest is the best plan. I will take your post as support for this idea.

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:27, topic:530453”][quote author=Brolapse link=topic=649213.msg4364240#msg4364240 date=1379346580]

From IRC:

%bnl | why not just move every single board over to moparscape from moparisthebest and close down moparisthebest forums
%bnl | then rename moparscape to moparisthebest
%bnl | ???

I have created a visual representation of what I believe this would look like:
http://i.imgur.com/YYsMDJx.jpg NSFW

p.s. I support this idea
[/quote]finally somebody who uses nsfw correctly[/quote]
Same goes for you, you post, you support. Good on you!

Read full topic
